===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=まんげつ}} {{m|zh|滿月|tr=mɑ̌n ngjwot|lit=full + moon}}. Compare modern {{etyl|nan|-}} reading ''móa-ge̍h''.

{{ja-pron|yomi=o|まんげつ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|まんげつ|kyu=滿月}}

# [[full moon]]
